alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:29PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR EASTERN SCOTT AND MORGAN COUNTIES... At 229 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jacksonville to 6 miles northeast of Athensville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Alexander and Waverly. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 56 and 78. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
